reference.title: ListDriveHardware
reference.shortdesc: You can use the ListDriveHardware method to list all the drives connected to a node. When used on individual nodes, this method returns drive hardware information. When used on the cluster master node MVIP, this method returns information for all drives on all nodes.

p.note: The "securitySupported": true line of the method response does not imply that the drives are capable of encryption; only that the security status can be queried. If you have a node type with a model number ending in "-NE", commands to enable security features on these drives will fail.

section.title: Parameters
section.p: This method has the following parameter:

row.entry: Set to true to run this method on all nodes.

section.title: Return value
section.p: This method has the following return value:

row.entry: Returned drive hardware information for the node.
